Docs.summary: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. Use the type-safe method instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Creates a pack URI Web request from a given [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
